text: There is considerable debate over how we should react if we detect a signal from an alien civilization.
translation: 如果我们探测到外星文明的信号，我们应该如何反应，这一点存在相当大的争议。

text: The two world wars, which interrupted the supply of raw material from Japan, also stifled the European silk industry.
translation: 两次世界大战中断了从日本的原材料供应，也扼制了欧洲的丝绸工业。

text: Migration is a complex issue, and biologists define it differently, depending in part on what sorts of animals they study.
translation: 迁徙是一个复杂的问题，生物学家对其定义不同，部分取决于他们研究的动物种类。

text: One way is by organizing backstage tours, so people can be shown round the building and learn how a theatre operates.
translation: 一种方法是通过组织后台游览，让人们参观建筑并了解剧院的运作方式。

text: What I am afraid will happen is that books and magazines will all disappear, and there’ll be just rows and rows of computers.
translation: 我担心会发生的情况是，书籍和杂志都将消失，只剩下成排成排的电脑。

text: The psychological laboratory has a strong claim to legitimacy and evokes trust and confidence in those who perform there.
translation: 心理实验室具有很强的合法性主张，并在其中工作的人中激发信任和信心。

text: The displays of art museums serve as a warning of what critical practices can emerge when spontaneous criticism is suppressed.
translation: 艺术博物馆的展览作为警告，表明当自发的批评被压制时，可能出现哪些批判性做法。

text: Vertical farming is an attempt to address the undoubted problems that we face in producing enough food for a growing population.
translation: 垂直农业是试图解决我们为不断增长的人口生产足够食物时面临的问题的尝试。

text: It was not until 1500 BC, however, that the first hollow glass container was made by covering a sand core with a layer of molten glass.
translation: 然而，直到公元前1500年，才通过在沙芯上覆盖一层熔融玻璃制作了第一个空心玻璃容器。

text: Many theorists believe the ideal boss should lead from behind, taking pride in collective accomplishment and giving credit where it is due.
translation: 许多理论家认为，理想的老板应该从幕后领导，为集体的成就感到骄傲，并给予应有的认可。

text: Though we might think of film as an essentially visual experience, we really cannot afford to underestimate the importance of film sound.
translation: 尽管我们可能认为电影本质上是一种视觉体验，但我们实在不能低估电影声音的重要性。

text: As far as goods transport is concerned, growth is due to a large extent to changes in the European economy and its system of production.
translation: 就货物运输而言，增长在很大程度上归因于欧洲经济及其生产体系的变化。

text: In order to track temporal hours during the day, inventors created sundials, which indicate time by the length or direction of the sun’s shadow.
translation: 为了追踪一天中的时间小时，发明者创造了日晷，通过太阳阴影的长度或方向来指示时间。

text: Lee Hall’s analysis of figures comparing the times of the fires and the proportion of seed that germinated was done in a lot of detail-very impressive.
translation: 李·霍尔对火灾时间和发芽种子比例的比较数据分析非常详细，令人印象深刻。

text: While the Inuit may not actually starve if hunting and trapping are curtailed by climate change, there has certainly been an impact on people’s health.
translation: 虽然因气候变化限制狩猎和捕获，因纽特人可能不会真正挨饿，但这肯定对人们的健康产生了影响。

text: It would seem that the brain sees these images as puzzles, and the harder it is to decipher the meaning, the more rewarding is the moment of recognition.
translation: 大脑似乎将这些图像视为谜题，解码意义越困难，识别的时刻就越有回报。

text: Such material, even where it appears comparatively trivial, can have a serious effect on the company, supplier or customer if it falls into the wrong hands.
translation: 即使这种材料看似相对琐碎，如果落入不法之手，也可能对公司、供应商或客户产生严重影响。

text: If the glass were kept hot enough, it would flow over the molten tin until the top surface was also flat, horizontal and perfectly parallel to the bottom surface.
translation: 如果玻璃保持足够热，它会流过熔融锡，直到顶部表面也变得平坦、水平并与底部表面完全平行。

text: It was once assumed that improvements in telecommunications would lead to more dispersal in the population as people were no longer forced into cities.
translation: 曾经人们假设电信的改进会导致人口更分散，因为人们不再被迫迁入城市。

text: Compared to language, all other inventions pale in significance, since everything we have ever achieved depends on language and originates from it.
translation: 与其他发明相比，语言的重要性尤为突出，因为我们所取得的成就都依赖于语言并源于它。

text: It’s true there are new regulations for mercury emissions from power plants, but these will need billions of dollars to implement and increase costs for everyone.
translation: 确实有新的发电厂汞排放法规，但实施这些法规需要数十亿美元，并将增加每个人的成本。

text: The teacher’s task is to assist the students to apply what they have learned paraconsciously, and in doing so to make it easily accessible to consciousness.
translation: 教师的任务是帮助学生无意识地应用所学知识，并通过这样做使其易于进入意识层面。

text: However, if one of the parties in a conflict sees human resources as simply a mouthpiece for the chief executive, then an external mediator might be able to help.
translation: 然而，如果冲突中的一方将人力资源视为首席执行官的代言人，那么外部调解人可能会有所帮助。

text: Summer leaves are green because they are full of chlorophyll, the molecule that captures sunlight and converts that energy into new building materials for the tree.
translation: 夏季的树叶是绿色的，因为它们充满了叶绿素，这种分子捕获阳光并将其能量转化为树的新建筑材料。

text: If clothing fails to meet these standards, as determined by the employee’s supervisor, the employee will be asked not to wear the inappropriate item to work again.
translation: 如果服装未能达到这些标准，由员工的监督者判定，员工将被要求不再穿不合适的服装上班。

text: The participants weren’t told beforehand whether the tunes were composed by humans or computers, but were asked to guess, and then rate how much they liked each one.
translation: 参与者事先不知道这些曲调是由人类还是计算机创作的，但被要求猜测，然后评价他们对每首曲子的喜欢程度。

text: If identical twins are more similar to each other with respect to an ailment than fraternal twins are, then vulnerability to the disease must be rooted at least in part in heredity.
translation: 如果同卵双胞胎在疾病方面比异卵双胞胎更相似，那么对该疾病的易感性至少部分植根于遗传。

text: Finally, perhaps the most graphic expressions of self-awareness in general can be seen in the displays of range which are most common from 18 months to 3 years of age.
translation: 最后，自我意识的最生动表达或许可以在18个月到3岁期间最常见的范围展示中看到。

text: If we can understand how geography affects our health no matter where in the world we are located, we can better treat disease, prevent illness, and keep people safe and well.
translation: 如果我们能理解地理如何影响我们的健康，无论我们身处世界何地，我们就能更好地治疗疾病，预防疾病，并确保人们安全健康。

text: Similarly, people who collect dolls may go beyond simply enlarging their collection, and develop an interest in the way that dolls are made, or the materials that are used.
translation: 同样，收集玩偶的人可能不仅仅是扩大收藏，还会发展出对玩偶制作方式或所用材料的兴趣。

text: He wanted to give people a feeling of suspense as they see the building first from a distance, and then close-up, and the shape of the building as a whole was that of a box.
translation: 他想让人们在从远处看到建筑，然后近距离观察时，感受到悬念，整个建筑的形状像一个盒子。

text: The reason often given for the low regard in which smell is held is that, in comparison with its importance among animals, the human sense of smell is feeble and undeveloped.
translation: 人们常认为嗅觉地位低下的原因是，与其在动物中的重要性相比，人类的嗅觉微弱且未充分发展。

text: Some of you suggested an Italian restaurant, but I must confess that I decided to book a Lebanese one, as we have plenty of opportunities to go to an Italian restaurant at home.
translation: 你们有些人建议意大利餐厅，但我必须承认，我决定预订黎巴嫩餐厅，因为我们在家有许多机会去意大利餐厅。

text: As these ancestral tortoises settled on the individual islands, the different populations adapted to their unique environments, giving rise to at least 14 different subspecies.
translation: 随着这些祖先乌龟定居在各个岛屿，不同种群适应了各自独特的环境，产生了至少14个不同亚种。

text: The continuous and reckless use of synthetic chemicals for the control of pests which pose a threat to agricultural crops and human health is proving to be counter-productive.
translation: 持续且不加节制地使用合成化学物质来控制对农作物和人类健康构成威胁的害虫，证明是适得其反的。

text: Both social and cognitive types of laughter tap into the same expressive machinery in our brains, the emotion and motor circuits that produce smiles and excited vocalisations.
translation: 社会和认知类型的笑声都利用了我们大脑中相同的表达机制，即产生微笑和兴奋发声的情感和运动回路。

text: Opinion polls suggest that many people nurture the belief that environmental standards are declining and four factors seem to cause this disjunction between perception and reality.
translation: 民意调查显示，许多人相信环境标准在下降，似乎有四个因素导致了这种感知与现实之间的脱节。

text: Natural soil fertility is dropping in many areas because of continuous industrial fertilizer and pesticide use, while the growth of algae is increasing in lakes because of the fertilizer run-off.
translation: 由于持续使用工业化肥和杀虫剂，许多地区的自然土壤肥力正在下降，而湖泊中的藻类生长因化肥径流而增加。

text: Within the span of several centuries, the Lapita stretched the boundaries of their world from the jungle-clad volcanoes of Papua New Guinea to the loneliest coral outliers of Tonga.
translation: 在几个世纪的时间跨度内，拉皮塔人将他们的世界边界从巴布亚新几内亚的丛林覆盖火山扩展到汤加最孤独的珊瑚外岛。

text: Multiplan insurance may not cover all pre-existing medical conditions-so before you leave be sure to check with them about any long-term illnesses or disabilities that you have.
translation: 多计划保险可能不覆盖所有预先存在的医疗状况，因此在离开前，请务必与他们核实你可能拥有的任何长期疾病或残疾。

text: As the medical world continues to grapple with what’s acceptable and what’s not, it is clear that companies must continue to be heavily scrutinized for their sales and marketing strategies.
translation: 随着医学界继续努力解决什么是可接受的、什么不是，显然公司必须继续对其销售和营销策略进行严格审查。

text: The reasoning is that if you replenish the ice sheets and frozen waters of the high latitudes, more light will be reflected back into space, so reducing the warming of oceans and atmosphere.
translation: 理由是，如果补充高纬度地区的冰盖和冻水，更多的光会被反射回太空，从而减少海洋和大气变暖。

text: A final theory is related to group behaviour, and suggests that sea mammals cannot distinguish between sick and healthy leaders and will follow sick leaders, even to an inevitable death.
translation: 一种最终理论与群体行为有关，表明海洋哺乳动物无法区分生病和健康的领导者，甚至会跟随生病的领导者走向不可避免的死亡。

text: From earliest childhood we are so bound up with our system of numeration that it is a feat of imagination to consider the problems faced by early humans who had not yet developed this facility.
translation: 从童年早期起，我们就与我们的计数系统紧密相连，想象早期人类尚未发展这一能力时面临的问题需要极大的想象力。

text: One of my purposes in writing this book is to give readers who haven’t had the opportunity to see and enjoy real mathematics the chance to appreciate the mathematical way of thinking.
translation: 我撰写此书的目的之一是让没有机会看到和享受真实数学的读者有机会欣赏数学思维方式。

text: We have also negotiated a range of benefits for staff such as discounted private healthcare and a car purchase scheme, along with a number of one-off deals with hotels and amusement parks.
translation: 我们还为员工协商了一系列福利，包括折扣私人医疗和购车计划，以及与酒店和游乐园的一些一次性优惠协议。

text: For many enthusiasts, the ultimate flight fantasy is the jet pack, a small piece of equipment on your back which enables you to climb vertically into the air and fly forwards, backwards and turn.
translation: 对许多爱好者来说，终极飞行幻想是喷气背包，这是一种背在身上的小型设备，使你能够垂直上升并向前、向后飞行并转弯。

text: The typical way of talking to a baby-high-pitched, exaggerated and repetitious-is a source of fascination for linguists who hope to understand how “baby talk” impacts on learning.
translation: 与婴儿交流的典型方式——高亢、夸张和重复——是语言学家着迷的来源，他们希望了解“婴儿语”如何影响学习。

text: Psychologists have long held that a person’s character cannot undergo a transformation in any meaningful way and that the key traits of personality are determined at a very young age.
translation: 心理学家长期认为，一个人的性格无法以任何有意义的方式发生转变，关键的个性特质在很小的时候就已确定。

text: It was only when the hull was hanging freely from the lifting frame, clear of the seabed and the suction effect of the surrounding mud, that the salvage operation progressed to the second stage.
translation: 只有当船体从起重架上自由悬挂，脱离海床及周围泥土的吸力时， salvage 操作才进入第二阶段。

text: They think the population of Rapa Nui grew rapidly and then remained more or less stable until the arrival of the Europeans, who introduced deadly diseases to which islanders had no immunity.
translation: 他们认为拉帕努伊的人口迅速增长，然后在欧洲人到来之前大致保持稳定，欧洲人带来了岛民没有免疫力的致命疾病。

text: Anyway, even though these noise maps are fairly crude, they’ve been useful in providing information and raising awareness that noise matters, we need to deal with it and so it’s a political matter.
translation: 无论如何，尽管这些噪声地图相当粗糙，它们在提供信息和提高人们对噪声重要性的认识方面一直很有用，我们需要处理它，因此这是一个政治问题。

text: Travel has existed since the beginning of time, when primitive man set out, often traversing great distances in search of game, which provided the food and clothing necessary for his survival.
translation: 旅行自时间开始就存在，当时原始人出发，常常跨越长距离寻找猎物，为生存提供必要的食物和衣物。

text: This is why composers often introduce a key note in the beginning of a song, spend most of the rest of the piece in the studious avoidance of the pattern, and then finally repeat it only at the end.
translation: 这就是为什么作曲家常常在歌曲开头引入一个主音，在大部分剩余部分刻意避免该模式，最后仅在结尾重复它。

text: In its most general sense, prescriptivism is the view that one variety of language has an inherently higher value than others, and that this ought to be imposed on the whole of the speech community.
translation: 在最广泛的意义上，规范主义认为某种语言变体天生比其他变体更有价值，并且应该强加给整个语言社区。

text: What we’ve decided to present today is information about just three species-because we felt these gave a good indication of the processes at work in rural and urban settings as a whole.
translation: 我们今天决定展示的是关于三种物种的信息，因为我们认为这些能很好地反映农村和城市整体环境中的运作过程。

text: The results of a 14-year study to be announced later this month reveal that the diseases associated with old age are afflicting fewer and fewer people and when they do strike, it is much later in life.
translation: 本月晚些时候将公布的14年研究结果显示，与老年相关的疾病影响的人数越来越少，而且发病时间也大大推迟。

text: Memory consolidation, the next step in forming an episodic memory, is the process by which memories of encoded information are strengthened, stabilized and stored to facilitate later retrieval.
translation: 记忆巩固是形成情景记忆的下一步，是通过加强、稳定和存储编码信息的记忆，以方便后来检索的过程。

text: In the course of conducting research in a number of industries and working directly with companies, we have discovered that managers often fail to recognize the less obvious but profound ways these trends are influencing consumers’ aspirations, attitudes, and behaviours.
translation: 在多个行业进行研究并直接与公司合作的过程中，我们发现经理们往往未能认识到这些趋势以不太明显但深刻的方式影响消费者愿望、态度和行为。

text: The conviction that historical relics provide infallible testimony about the past is rooted in the nineteenth and early twentieth centuries, when science was regarded as objective and value free.
translation: 认为历史遗迹能提供关于过去的无误证词的信念，植根于19世纪和20世纪初，当时科学被视为客观且无价值的。

text: After this, many researchers switched to autoganzfeld tests-an automated variant of the technique which used computers to perform many of the key tasks such as the random selection of images.
translation: 在此之后，许多研究者转向了自动ganzfeld测试，这是一种自动化变体，利用计算机执行许多关键任务，如图像的随机选择。

text: Unless there are no purchase facilities available at the station where you began your journey, you will be required to pay the full fare if you are unable to produce a valid ticket for inspection during a journey.
translation: 除非你在旅程开始的车站没有购票设施，否则如果在旅途中无法出示有效票据供检查，你将被要求支付全票价。

text: Although population, industrial output and economic productivity have continued to soar in developed nations, the rate at which people withdraw water from aquifers, rivers and lakes has slowed.
translation: 尽管发达国家的人口、工业产出和经济生产率持续飙升，但人们从地下水、河流和湖泊中提取水资源的速率已放缓。

text: High achievers have been found to use self-regulatory learning strategies more often and more effectively than lower achievers, and are better able to transfer these strategies to deal with unfamiliar tasks.
translation: 研究发现，高成就者比低成就者更经常、更有效地使用自我调节学习策略，并且能更好地将这些策略应用于处理不熟悉的任务。

text: Research also indicates that bilingual experience may help to keep the cognitive mechanisms sharp by recruiting alternate brain networks to compensate for those that become damaged during aging.
translation: 研究还表明，双语经验可能通过招募替代大脑网络来补偿老化过程中受损的网络，从而帮助保持认知机制的敏锐。

text: Not only was a monopoly of cinnamon becoming impossible, but the spice trade overall was diminishing in economic potential, and was eventually superseded by the rise of trade in coffee, tea, chocolate, and sugar.
translation: 不仅肉桂垄断变得不可能，整个香料贸易的经济潜力也在下降，最终被咖啡、茶、巧克力和糖贸易的兴起所取代。

text: Another feature that attracted a lot of attention was an interactive journey through a number of the locations chosen for blockbuster films which had made use of New Zealand’s stunning scenery as a backdrop.
translation: 另一个吸引大量注意的特色是通过一些为大片选址的互动之旅，这些地点利用了新西兰壮丽的风景作为背景。

text: As researchers on aging noted recently, no treatment on the market today has been proved to slow human aging-the build-up of molecular and cellular damage that increases vulnerability to infirmity as we grow older.
translation: 老龄化研究人员最近指出，目前市场上没有任何治疗方法被证明能减缓人类老化——分子和细胞损伤的积累随着年龄增长增加了虚弱的脆弱性。

text: We tend to think of climate-as opposed to weather-as something unchanging, yet humanity has been at the mercy of climate change for its entire existence, with at least eight glacial episodes in the past 730,000 years.
translation: 我们倾向于将气候（与天气相对）视为不变的东西，然而人类自存在以来一直受制于气候变化，过去73万年里至少经历了八次冰期。

text: In common with all mammals, reptiles and birds, the remote ancestors of tortoises were marine fish and before that various more or less worm-like creatures stretching back, still in the sea, to the primeval bacteria.
translation: 与所有哺乳动物、爬行动物和鸟类一样，乌龟的遥远祖先是海洋鱼类，在那之前是各种或多或少像蠕虫的生物，追溯到海中的原始细菌。

text: It is finished manufactured products that dominate the flow of trade, and, thanks to technological advances such as lightweight components, manufactured goods themselves have tended to become lighter and less bulky.
translation: 主导贸易流动的是制成品，多亏了轻质部件等技术进步，制成品本身也趋向于变得更轻、更不笨重。

text: It’s true that the actual construction of the house was harmful to the environment, mainly because they had to use massive amounts of concrete-one of the biggest sources of carbon dioxide in manufacturing.
translation: 确实，房子的实际建造对环境有害，主要是因为他们不得不使用大量的混凝土，这是制造业中最大的二氧化碳来源之一。

text: The difficulty with the evidence produced by these studies, fascinating as they are in collecting together anecdotes and apparent similarities and exceptions, is that they are not what we would today call norm-referenced.
translation: 这些研究产生的证据的困难在于，尽管它们在收集轶事、明显的相似性和例外方面引人入胜，但它们并不是我们今天所说的规范参照。

text: Businesses are finding that ethnography can offer them deeper insight into the possible needs of customers, either present or future, as well as providing valuable information about their attitudes towards existing products.
translation: 企业发现民族志可以为他们提供对客户当前或未来可能需求的更深入洞察，同时提供有关他们对现有产品态度的宝贵信息。

text: Education is a hiring requirement for 60% of employment opportunities, but 40% of human resources staff say that if they do not know a lot about the value of documents attained elsewhere, they will not recognize them.
translation: 教育是60%就业机会的招聘要求，但40%的人力资源人员表示，如果他们不了解其他地方获得的文件的价值，他们就不会认可这些文件。

text: The impression is that the logical nature of the textbooks and their comprehensive coverage of different types of examples, combined with the relative homogeneity of the class, renders work sheets unnecessary.
translation: 印象是，教科书逻辑性强且全面覆盖不同类型的例子，加上班级相对同质化，使工作表变得不必要。

text: Most tickets may be used for travel by Sleeper, subject to availability, and a reservation in a two-berth cabin can be made for $25, except in the case of Solo and Special tickets, which include Sleeper reservation in the fare.
translation: 大多数车票可用于卧铺旅行，视供应情况而定，可预订双人舱，费用为25美元，但Solo和特别票除外，这些票价已包含卧铺预订。

text: Operating on the same principle as wind turbines, the power in sea turbines comes from tidal currents which turn blades similar to ships’ propellers, but, unlike wind, the tides are predictable and the power input is constant.
translation: 海轮机与风力涡轮机基于相同原理，其动力来自潮汐流，驱动类似于船螺旋桨的叶片，但与风不同，潮汐是可预测的，输入功率是恒定的。

text: These discoveries have led to the field known as neuroeconomics, which studies the brain’s secrets to success in an economic environment that demands innovation and being able to do things differently from competitors.
translation: 这些发现催生了称为神经经济学的领域，该领域研究大脑在要求创新和与竞争对手不同的经济环境中成功的秘密。

text: While the detrimental effects of noise in classroom situations are not limited to children experiencing disability, those with a disability that affects their processing of speech and verbal communication could be extremely vulnerable.
translation: 虽然课堂环境中噪音的有害影响不仅限于有残疾的儿童，但那些因残疾影响语音和口头沟通处理的儿童可能极为脆弱。

text: By timing the transit from two widely-separated locations, teams of astronomers could calculate the parallax angle-the apparent difference in position of an astronomical body due to a difference in the observer’s position.
translation: 通过在两个相距很远的地点测量过境时间，天文学家团队可以计算视差角——由于观察者位置差异导致的天体位置的表观差异。

text: Victimised pupils are more likely to experience difficulties with interpersonal relationships as adults, while children who persistently bully are more likely to grow up to be physically violent, and convicted of anti-social offences.
translation: 受欺凌的学生成年后更可能在人际关系上遇到困难，而持续欺凌他人的儿童更有可能长大后变得身体暴力，并被判犯有反社会罪行。

text: On the negative side, this type of organization doesn’t always act effectively, because it depends too much on one or two people at the top, and when these people make poor decisions there’s no-one else who can influence them.
translation: 从消极面看，这种组织类型并非总是有效，因为它过于依赖高层的一两个人，当这些人做出糟糕决定时，没有其他人能影响他们。

text: Researchers from nine countries are working together to create a map linked to a database that can be fed measurements from field surveys, drone surveys, satellite imagery, lab analyses and so on to provide real-time data on the state of soil.
translation: 来自九个国家的研究人员正在合作创建一张地图，连接到一个数据库，该数据库可以输入实地调查、无人机调查、卫星图像、实验室分析等测量数据，以提供土壤状态的实时数据。

text: As the fire continued to rage, the National Trust’s conservators were being mobilized, and that evening local stationers were especially opened to provide the bulk supplies of blotting paper so desperately needed in the salvage operation.
translation: 随着大火持续燃烧，国家信托的保护人员被动员起来，那天晚上当地文具店特别开放，以提供 salvage 操作急需的大量吸墨纸。

text: Her contribution to physics had been immense, not only in her own work, the importance of which had been demonstrated by her two Nobel Prizes, but because of her influence on subsequent generations of nuclear physicists and chemists.
translation: 她对物理学的贡献巨大，不仅体现在她自己的工作上（其重要性已通过她的两个诺贝尔奖得以证明），还因为她对后代核物理学家和化学家的影响。

text: The taxonomist sometimes overlooks whole species in favour of those groups currently under study, while the ecologist often collects only a limited number of specimens of each species, thus reducing their value for taxonomic investigations.
translation: 分类学家有时会忽视整个物种，而偏向于当前研究的群体，而生态学家通常只收集每个物种的有限样本，从而降低了它们对分类研究的价值。

text: Many CEOs combine two opposing characteristics: confidence-that is, the belief that they’re capable of great achievements-with a high level of anxiety, a fear of missing targets, whether set by themselves or by the directors of the company.
translation: 许多首席执行官结合了两种对立特性：信心——即相信自己有能力取得巨大成就——与高度焦虑，害怕错过目标，无论这些目标是自己设定的还是公司董事设定的。

text: A radical solution, which may work for some very large companies whose businesses are extensive and complex, is the professional board, whose members would work up to three or four days a week, supported by their own dedicated staff and advisers.
translation: 一种激进的解决方案，可能适用于一些业务广泛且复杂的超大型公司，是专业董事会，其成员每周工作三到四天，由专职员工和顾问支持。

text: This approach is summarized in the statement that it is the task of the grammarian to describe, not to prescribe-to record the facts of linguistic diversity, and not to attempt the impossible tasks of evaluating language variation or halting language change.
translation: 这种方法总结为，语法学家的任务是描述而非规定——记录语言多样性的事实，而不是试图完成评估语言变异或阻止语言变化的 impossible 任务。

text: Some recent interdisciplinary research has come out with results that at first sight seem contradictory-a city needs to have a sense of activity, so it needs to be lively, with sounds like the clack of high heels on a pavement or the hiss of a coffee machine, but these mustn’t be too intrusive, because at the same time we need to be able to relax.
translation: 一些最新的跨学科研究得出了一些乍看之下似乎矛盾的结果——一个城市需要有活跃感，因此需要充满活力，有高跟鞋在人行道上敲击或咖啡机发出嘶嘶声等声音，但这些声音不能过于侵扰，因为与此同时我们需要能够放松。

text: Another strange feature of the Japanese pagoda is that, because the building tapers, with each successive floor plan being smaller than the one below, none of the vertical pillars that carry the weight of the building is connected to its corresponding pillar above.
translation: 日本宝塔的另一个奇怪特点是，由于建筑逐渐变窄，每个楼层的平面图比下面的小，支撑建筑重量的垂直柱子均未与其上方的对应柱子连接。

text: An accident that occurred in the skies over the Grand Canyon in 1956 resulted in the establishment of the Federal Aviation Administration(FAA) to regulate and oversee the operation of aircraft in the skies over the United States, which were becoming quite congested.
translation: 1956年在大峡谷上空发生的一次事故导致了联邦航空管理局(FAA)的建立，以监管和监督美国日益拥挤的空中飞机的操作。

text: Tourists flock to wells in far-flung corners of north-western India to gaze in wonder at these architectural marvels from hundreds of years ago, which serve as a reminder of both the ingenuity and artistry of ancient civilizations and of the value of water to human existence.
translation: 游客蜂拥至印度西北部偏远角落的水井，惊叹于这些数百年前的建筑奇迹，这些奇迹既提醒人们古代文明的智慧和艺术，也提醒人们水对人类生存的价值。

text: The antiseptic properties of tannin, the active ingredient in tea, and of hops in beer-plus the fact that both are made with boiled water-allowed urban communities to flourish at close quarters without succumbing to water-borne diseases such as dysentery.
translation: 茶中的活性成分单宁和啤酒中的啤酒花具有抗菌特性，再加上两者都用煮沸的水制成，使城市社区能够在近距离繁荣发展，而不屈服于痢疾等水传播疾病。

text: As recently as 1993, engineers made a major breakthrough by discovering so called turbo codes-which come very close to Shannon’s ultimate limit for the maximum rate that data can be transmitted reliably, and now play a key role in the mobile videophone revolution.
translation: 直到1993年，工程师们通过发现所谓的涡轮码取得了重大突破，这些码非常接近香农对数据可靠传输最大速率的极限，现在在移动视频电话革命中发挥关键作用。

text: If a life span is a genetically determined biological characteristic, it is logically necessary to propose the existence of an internal clock, which in some way measures and controls the ageing process and which finally determines death as the last step in a fixed programme.
translation: 如果寿命是遗传决定的生物学特性，逻辑上必须提出存在一个内部时钟，它以某种方式测量和控制衰老过程，并最终将死亡确定为固定程序的最后一步。

text: Participants in the online debate argued that our biggest challenge is to address the underlying causes of the agricultural system’s inability to ensure sufficient food for all, and they identified as drivers of this problem our dependency on fossil fuels and unsupportive government policies.
translation: 在线辩论的参与者认为，我们最大的挑战是解决农业系统无法为所有人提供足够食物的根本原因，他们认为这一问题的驱动因素是我们对化石燃料的依赖和不支持的政府政策。

text: Already in laboratory trials they have tested strategies for neutralizing the power of thunderstorms, and this winter they will brave real storms, equipped with an armoury of lasers that they will be pointing towards the heavens to discharge thunderclouds before lightning can strike.
translation: 他们已经在实验室试验中测试了中和雷暴力量的策略，今年冬天他们将面对真实风暴，装备一组激光器，向天空发射以在闪电击中之前释放雷云。

text: Eliminating the secrecy surrounding pay by openly communicating everyone’s remuneration, publicizing performance bonuses and allocating annual salary increases in a lump sum rather than spreading them out over an entire year are examples of actions that will make rewards move visible and potentially more motivating.
translation: 通过公开沟通每个人的薪酬、公布绩效奖金以及将年度工资增长一次性分配而不是分摊整个年度来消除薪酬秘密，这些行动的例子将使奖励更显眼并可能更有激励性。
